text: (Viec TA ban Kinh Qur’an xuong la) đe cho cac nguoi (hoi nhung ke đa than A-rap) khong noi: “Qua that Kinh Sach (Tawrah va Injil) chi đuoc ban xuong cho hai nhom nguoi (Do thai va Thien Chua) truoc chung toi, con chung toi đoi voi viec hoc hoi Kinh Sach cua ho thi khong biet gi (boi no đuoc ban xuong khong bang tieng noi cua chung toi).”
